description.INCIDENT_DETAIL_EN: Commissioning of New Traffic Lane at Hong Kong Island Bound Exit of Western Harbour Crossing
description.INCIDENT_DETAIL_CN: 西區海底隧道往香港島方向出口增建行車線的啟用

2025-11-29T18:00:00.CONTENT_EN: Motorists are advised that, the new traffic lane at Hong Kong Island Bound Exit of Western Harbour Crossing will be commissioned from 6.00 am on 30 November 2025 (Sunday). Upon the commissioning of the new traffic lane, the slip road leading from Western Harbour Crossing to Central District, Sai Ying Pun and Sheung Wan will be expanded to three traffic lanes, providing two traffic lanes heading for Central District and one traffic lane heading for Sai Ying Pun or Sheung Wan. Appropriate traffic signs and road markings will be provided on-site to guide motorists.
2025-11-29T18:00:00.CONTENT_CN: 駕駛人士請注意，西區海底隧道往香港島方向出口增建的行車線將於2025年11月30日（星期日）上午6時起啟用。屆時，由西區海底隧道通往中區、西營盤及上環的支路將擴闊至三線行車道，提供兩條行車線往中區，以及一條行車線往西營盤或上環。 有關地點將設置適當交通標誌及道路標記，指導駕駛人士。

2025-11-30T14:50:00.CONTENT_EN: All car parks at West Kowloon Cultural District are full. Members of the public are encouraged to take public transport to the West Kowloon Cultural District.
2025-11-30T14:50:00.CONTENT_CN: 西九文化區內所有停車場現已泊滿車輛，前往西九文化區一帶的市民請使用公共交通工具。
